explains: n. 垂饰，坠饰；吊灯；短索；补充作品；三角旗

sentences.en: She told the artist, "Paint me with diamond earrings, a diamond necklace, emerald bracelets, and a ruby pendant."
sentences.cn: 她告诉那位肖像画家说：“画带着钻石耳环、钻石项链、祖母绿手镯，还有红宝石垂饰的我。”

sentences.en: I can preserve his inspiring legacy more powerfully through writing than through the hummingbird pendant I wear around my neck.
sentences.cn: 比起我脖子上佩戴的那个蜂鸟链坠，写作更能让我有力地继承他那些让人激动的遗产。

sentences.en: We envision the camera becoming so small that it integrates into clothing, such as the button of a shirt, a brooch, or a pendant.
sentences.cn: 我们想象一下，如果这个摄影机非常小巧，我们就可以把它放进衣服里，像衬衫扣子、胸针、或是项链的坠子一样。
